sql.name: cmcccommunicationquartlypage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: cmcccommunicationquartly.group
cmcccommunicationquartly.left
sql.item: select trim('GSM核心网') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('独立设置的TDM一级汇接交换机E1端口数量(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('独立设置的TDM二级汇接交换机E1端口数量(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('一级、二级合设的TDM汇接交换机E1端口数量(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('汇接软交换媒体网关TMG等效E1端口数量(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('独立设置的TDM关口交换机GMSC数量(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('基于TDM的GMSC关口交换机E1端口数量(个) ') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('独立设置的软交换关口交换机GMSC SERVER数量(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('独立设置的软交换关口媒体网关GMSC MGW数量(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('基于软交换的关口交换机GMSC等效E1端口数量(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('CMNET') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('CMNET省骨干网路由器台数(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('CMNET省网骨干以太网交换机数量(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('村通工程网络设备') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('村通工程GSM基站数(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('村通工程GSM载频数(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('村通工程话音信道数(个)') as 季报指标 from dual union all select trim('村通工程无线网月均忙时话务量(Erl)') as 季报指标 from dual

sql.name: cmcccommunicationquartly.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('独立设置的TDM一级汇接交换机E1端口数量(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000016) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('独立设置的TDM二级汇接交换机E1端口数量(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000017) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('一级、二级合设的TDM汇接交换机E1端口数量(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000018) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('汇接软交换媒体网关TMG等效E1端口数量(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000035) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('独立设置的TDM关口交换机GMSC数量(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000037) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('基于TDM的GMSC关口交换机E1端口数量(个) ') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000039) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('独立设置的软交换关口交换机GMSC SERVER数量(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000041) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('独立设置的软交换关口媒体网关GMSC MGW数量(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000043) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('基于软交换的关口交换机GMSC等效E1端口数量(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000045) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('CMNET省骨干网路由器台数(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000019) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('CMNET省网骨干以太网交换机数量(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000020) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('村通工程GSM基站数(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000022) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('村通工程GSM载频数(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000023) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('村通工程话音信道数(个)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000024) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('村通工程无线网月均忙时话务量(Erl)') ,t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000063) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
